CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Lienholder__c ),"", Lienholder__r.Street__c& IF(ISNULL(Lienholder__r.AddressLine2__c),""," "&Lienholder__r.AddressLine2__c)&", "& Lienholder__r.City__c &", "& TEXT(Lienholder__r.StateProvinceCode__c) &" "& Lienholder__r.ZipPostalCode__c)
CustomField.label: Lienholder Address
